author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
How does Adam Savage deal with his depression after completing a project? What is Adam's biggest missed opportunity? Is creation a destructive or a constructive art? For those who bought Adam's keychain, what's the best way to protect it? Will Dave Fogler ever do another build in the cave? In this live stream excerpt Adam answers these questions from Tested members MarkChuCarroll, cyberpunkmodsdotcom, brianbaker2455, clanreignfire and shadowfax1007, whom we thank for their support. Do you think of creation as a destructive art or a constructive art? 

00:00 Completion depression 
04:01 Biggest missed opportunity
04:57 Creation as destruction
09:06 Protecting the Savage keychain
11:05 Dave Fogler of @cinodrome 
The Star Wars Speeder Bike Reimagined (with @cinodrome): https://youtu.be/s4ru0dfBN2Q
Adam Savage Makes a Leather Punch Tool! https://youtu.be/-tgUwQqAJHk
Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks, like asking Adam a question:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC
title: Dealing With Completion Grief
